column4: how can one sort collection by file path, rather than artist name in amarok? can it be done ?
you might like the amarok plugin for nautilus
you need to install 'nautilus-actions' then install the amarok plugin into that
http://www.grumz.net/index.php?q=configlist  : and another thing, you also can configure nautilus to preview sounds files - just needs the right lib file installed
